text: Ruth van der Meijden (born 15 August 1984) is a Dutch long distance runner. van der Meijden represents Netherlands at international competitions. Van der Meijden tried to run the qualifying time for the 2020 Summer Olympics at an abandoned airport. She was not able to do so. She competed at the 2022 European Athletics Championships in the marathon event. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Dutch long-distance runners Category:Living people
title: Ruth van der Meijden
